articles.description: Klete Keller, 38,  who won two Olympic gold medals as a relay teammate of Michael Phelps, was charged in a federal court in D.C. on Wednesday, court records show.
articles.content:
Olympic gold medalist swimmer Klete Keller (pictured in his ID photo) was charged on Wednesday with participating in last week's Capitol riots 
A US Olympic gold medalist swimmer who was spotted at … [+9460 chars]
